sentence.Network_en: Their bodies had suffered contortion as a result of malnutrition.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于营养不良他们的躯体都变了形。

sentence.Network_en: This sentence was spoken with the bitterness of self - upbraiding, and a contortion of visage absolutely demoniacal.
sentence.Network_cn: 这话是用辛辣的 自我 谴责的口吻说出来的,说话时他的面孔也歪扭得象个地道的魔鬼.

sentence.Network_en: Also yoga is very similar to contortion.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且瑜珈和柔术是很相似的.

entry.tran: (躯体、面部等的)扭弯，扭曲，变形
entry.def: Contortions are movements of your body or face into unusual shapes or positions.

example.ex: I had to admire the contortions of the gymnasts.
example.tran: 我不得不为这些体操运动员们高难度的扭体动作而赞叹。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of twisting or deforming the shape of something (e.g., yourself)
2. a tortuous and twisted shape or position;

sentences.sentence: "they built a tree house in the tortuosities of its boughs"
